Dominant Langwith firsts ease into Vase semis

Langwith firsts began life in the newly created Vase with a resounding 5-2 win against Vanbrugh fourths, with front man Sam Woodall slamming home four goals to help the men from Hes East sweep past

Firsts on top in postgrad clash

Wentworth firsts booked their place in the Plate semi finals with a 7-2 win over the postgrads' second team

College Cup Group Stage Review

As the College Cup quarter finals approach, Dan Holland takes a look at how the tournament has progressed so far

Derwent secure Cup progression with win over James

Derwent firsts secured their progression through to the Cup with a stylish 3-0 win over James seconds on the JLD this afternoon

Vanbrugh edge past Halifax to top group

Vanbrugh firsts put in a professional performance against Halifax thirds to take a 2-0 victory and finish top of Group D going into the Cup quarter-finals

Goodricke seconds march into Vase with nine goal rout

Goodricke seconds finished off the group stages in imperious form, crushing a below-strength Langwith thirds side 9-0, with Joe Mann and captain Fabian Ashurst scoring hat-tricks

Halifax through to the Cup after defeating spirited Vanbrugh

Halifax seconds saw off a spirited Vanbrugh side to see them finish second in Group C and secure their progression to the Cup

Goodricke crush Wentworth to secure top spot

Goodricke firsts put nine goals, including a Dan Gorringe hat-trick, past Wentworth thirds in a 9-0 victory that saw them top Group C with consummate ease

Plate-bound Alcuin see off Langwith

A dubious Greg Fearn goal was enough for Alcuin firsts to see off a battling Langwith seconds side on the JLD this afternoon

Alcuin thirds take Vase spot

A 1-1 draw with Goodricke thirds was enough to see Alcuin thirds take fifth in Group B and a place in the Vase

Vanbrugh hold nerve in thrilling draw to go through to the Cup

In one of the matches of the tournament so far Vanbrugh seconds managed to hold their nerve in a pulsating 3-3 draw against Wentworth firsts to go through to the Cup quarter finals

York complete the double against Sheffield in brilliant end to season

York's women's cricketers defeated Sheffield University by 71 runs yesterday on 22 acres

University could be Rugby World Cup training venue

The University is involved in the bidding process to be a training venue for the 2015 Rugby World Cup

Five wins from five for James

James firsts maintained their winning form with a 2-0 victory over Derwent seconds in their final Group B match today

James thirds Steel quarter final place

A second half equaliser from Jordan Steel secured James thirds a spot in the College Cup quarter finals, as they drew 1-1 with Langwith firsts this afternoon

Wentworth take third spot with Alcuin demolition

Three late goals saw Wentworth seconds take their place in the Plate after seeing off Alcuin seconds 4-1

Halifax firsts complete group stage domination

Halifax firsts made sure they went through the College Cup group stage with their 100 per cent record intact, as they beat Derwent thirds 4-0 today

The King of the Swingers

The past test series against New Zealand saw James Anderson reach the monumental milestone of 300 test wickets. Beth Jakubowski looks back at his career and why it was a fitting occasion for the Lancastrian

Derwent thirds shrug off points deduction to beat Alcuin

Derwent thirds put their points deduction nightmare to bed with an assured win over Alcuin seconds to keep their hopes of qualifying for the cup alive

James breeze past Wentworth to boost Cup hopes

James thirds brushed aside Wentworth seconds on the JLD this afternoon thanks to goals from Will Manners and Will Goodwin

Halifax dismantle depleted Langwith

Halifax firsts strolled to an emphatic 9-0 victory over Langwith firsts this afternoon, cementing their position at the top of Group A

Derwent firsts too strong for Goodricke

Two goals in each half was enough to see Derwent firsts edge past Goodricke in a comfortable display which rarely required them to get out of first gear

James grind out win over Halifax

James seconds ground out a 1-0 win over Halifax thirds on the JLD this afternoon

Vanbrugh crush Langwith as run goes on

Eight different players got onto the scoresheet as Vanbrugh firsts beat Langwith thirds 10-0 to maintain their 100 per cent record in this year's Cup

Trio of College Cup points deductions

Langwith seconds, Langwith thirds, and Derwent thirds have all been deducted two points for failure to provide referees this week

Clinical Vanbrugh dispatch Langwith

Goals from Chris Mason and Dom McKinnon-Green saw Vanbrugh thirds beat Langwith seconds 2-0 this afternoon

Halifax seconds edge feisty Goodricke encounter

Ed Henry was the Halifax hero as their seconds team beat Goodricke firsts 1-0 in a gritty, hard-fought affair

Controversial Chadwick goal sees off Wentworth

Alcuin firsts squeezed past Wentworth thirds in today's Group C match thanks to a controversial winner from Tom Chadwick

James hit four past Vanbrugh to maintain winning streak

James firsts secured top spot in Group B and progression to the College Cup quarter finals with a 4-0 win over Vanbrugh seconds yesterday

Wentworth brush aside Alcuin in six goal rout

Wentworth firsts brushed aside a plucky Alcuin thirds side, in a display which saw them slam home six goals in the second half in a sunny fixture on the JLD
